post:
Hey there! Now we have the ability to install Windows on cheap [Cloud VPS](https://justvps.com/vps/cloud/?utm_source=forums&utm_medium=offer&utm_campaign=LET "Cloud VPS") plans in Singapore!

Enjoy 99.999% uptime and total scalabiliy with [Just Cloud VPS](https://justvps.com/vps/cloud/?utm_source=forums&utm_medium=offer&utm_campaign=LET "Just Cloud VPS"). Powered with OpenNebula, Just Cloud VPS will help you achieve success with minimum waste and maximum efficiency!

More about us on [lowendbox.com](https://lowendbox.com/blog/singapore-hosting-from-justvps-start-at-2-52-mo-for-wordpress-or-3-68-for-kvm-1st-month/ "lowendbox.com")

**Just Cloud Light**

•	1024 MB RAM
•	1x vCPU
•	25GB SSD space
•	1TB transfer
•	100 Mbps uplink
•	1x IPv4
•	1x IPv6
•	KVM/Cloud/OpenNebula
•	Coupon: Justbest2
•	$3.68/month for the first purchase, then $4.90
•	$37.35/year for the first purchase, then $58.80
        [[ORDER]](https://justvps.com/order/vds/250/1013/?utm_source=forums&utm_medium=offer&utm_campaign=LET "[ORDER]")

**Just Cloud Basic**

•	2048 MB RAM
•	1x vCPU
•	55GB SSD space
•	1TB transfer
•	100 Mbps uplink
•	1x IPv4
•	1x IPv6
•	KVM/Cloud/OpenNebula
•	Coupon: Justbest2
•	$5.93/month for the first purchase, then $7.90
•	$59.85/year for the first purchase, then $94.80
        [[ORDER]](https://justvps.com/order/vds/251/1030/?utm_source=forums&utm_medium=offer&utm_campaign=LET "[ORDER]")
	

**Panels Available:**
cPanel
Plesk Admin
ISP Manger Lite
VestaCP

Windows is available on Just Cloud Basic plan and above

Looking glass:
http://sg.lg.justvps.online/

[JustVPS.com](https://justvps.com/vps/cloud/?utm_source=forums&utm_medium=offer&utm_campaign=LET "JustVPS.com")
